subject: Accidents and Safety
Automobiles
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion sprinter Usain Bolt was in a car crash in Jamaica, but police and his manager said he and an unidentified female passenger escaped injury. They were taken to a hospital in Spanish Town. Bolt was apparently speeding on a rain-slicked highway when he lost control of the BMW M3, the police said.
